messages.subject: The Nekked Thang
messages.msgSnippet: Thank goodness.. I thought I was the only one with a child that sheds his clothes the moment his feet hit our house.  Because of the prudishness of many
messages.messageBody:
Thank goodness.. I thought I was the only one with a child that sheds his
clothes the moment his feet hit our house. Because of the prudishness of
many Americans that I run into I was worried last summer about getting my
films developed. Most of them were of the kids doing things naked in the
back garden, such as building sandcastles, painting on the walls, climbing
on the playset, running through the water and in the house there Zak was
naked building legos, playing on his computer. Max also kept trying to take
of his diaper and would sometimes do that. Some of my friends think it's
odd that he doesn't put clothes on. I don't. He puts them on when he goes
to play soccer or go to Karate or a playdate. I don't have to force him to
do that... But when he's home he loves to be naked... and I thought this was
a Virgo thing (LOL).

Dawn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
